#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <algorithm>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	long long N, Q, min = -1, max = -1;
	vector<long long> elements;
	cin >> N >> Q;

	for (long long i = 0; i < N; i++)
	{
		long long temp;
		cin >> temp;
		elements.push_back(temp);
		if (i == 0)
		{
			min = temp;
			max = temp;
		}
		else if (min > temp)
			min = temp;
		else if (max < temp)
			max = temp;
	}

	for (int i = 0; i < Q; i++)
	{
		long long temp;
		cin >> temp;

		if (temp >= min && temp <= max)
			cout << "Yes" << endl;
		else
			cout << "No" << endl;
	}
	
	return 0;
}
